mapper.select: SELECT count(notice_no) FROM notice WHERE notice_no > 0
SELECT notice_no, notice_title, notice_content, notice_date FROM notice WHERE notice_no = #{noticeNo}

SELECT notice_no, notice_title, notice_content, notice_date FROM (select notice_no, notice_title, notice_content, notice_date, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY notice_no DESC,notice_date DESC) as rnum from notice) where rnum between #{sizePerPage}*#{page}-9 and #{sizePerPage}*#{page}
